net.java.jddac.jmdi.fblock
Class MessageQueueBlock

java.lang.Object
  net.java.jddac.common.fblock.Entity
      net.java.jddac.jmdi.fblock.FunctionBlock
          net.java.jddac.jmdi.fblock.MessageQueueBlock
All Implemented Interfaces:
ConfigurationInterface, CommListener, SubscriberCallback
public class MessageQueueBlock
extends FunctionBlock
implements CommListener

This function block queues messages that are destined for probes until the probe checks in.

configure

public void configure(ArgArray configuration)
               throws java.lang.Exception
Description copied from interface: ConfigurationInterface
Provides a method to configure object properties. The registry argument contains an ArgArray composed named values. Any values that are not specified are assumed to be left unchanged. That is, if a value is not present, do not assume it means 0 or true or some other default. This allows the configure method to be used to set a single value without affecting other values.

Specified by:
configure in interface ConfigurationInterface
Overrides:
configure in class FunctionBlock
Parameters:
configuration - contains incoming configuration parameters as named values.

Name Default Description
Reporter.commSubList   Specifies non-local communication traffic patterns. See CommFabric.addMessageListener(Vector, CommListener) for details.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception
See Also:

perform

public ArgArray perform(java.lang.String server_operation_id,
                        ArgArray server_input_arguments)
                 throws ClientServerException,
                        OpException
Generic Perform interface. Provides following services: 
     OpIdStoreMessage      - Stores a message.
        In:  (0) String - NCAP ID of Probe that the message is destined for.
             (1) ArgumentArray - Outgoing message.
     OpIdGetMessages       - Retrieves all messages for a probe and then clear the queue.
        In:  (0) String - NCAP ID of Probe.
        Out: (0) ArgumentArray
     OpIdListAllMessages   - Dumps all stored messages to standard out.
        In:  None.
     OpIdListProbeMessages - Returns a copy of messages for a probe.  Message queue contents are not touched.
        In:  (0) String - NCAP ID of Probe.
        Out: (0) ArgumentArray

Overrides:
perform in class FunctionBlock
Parameters:
server_operation_id - contains teh operation id for the call
server_input_arguments - contains the incoming parameters
Returns:
OpReturnCode for status
Throws:
ClientServerException
OpException
See Also:
Entity.perform(java.lang.String, net.java.jddac.common.type.ArgArray)
